org.sakaiproject.assignment.api.model

Interface AssignmentSupplementItemService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssignmentSupplementItemServiceImpl

    public interface AssignmentSupplementItemService
    This is the interface for accessing assignment supplement item
    Author:
    zqian
